definition: alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: The process of phytosterol extraction from soybean oil deodorizer distillate was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對脫臭餾出物中提取植物甾醇的工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: The crude phytosterols dissolved in solvent and reacted with metal salts to get the complex.
sentences.chinese: 將粗製甾醇溶於溶劑中與金屬鹽溶液形成絡合物。

sentences.english: The feasibility of ergosterol as an index to estimate grain safety degree was discussed in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 探討了麥角甾醇作爲評價糧食質量安全指標的可行性。

sentences.english: Plant stanols can safely be used with cholesterol lowering medication.
sentences.chinese: 植物甾醇可用來作爲安全降低膽固醇的藥物。

sentences.english: Cholesterol is the principal sterol and it is an essential component of animal cell membranes.
sentences.chinese: 膽固醇是哺乳動物體內最重要的一類甾醇小分子。

sentences.english: The current findings further support the idea of using plant sterols to improve health.
sentences.chinese: 當前研究進一步支持利用植物甾醇促進健康的理論。

sentences.english: Phytosterols belong to the steroids and have many important physiological functions.
sentences.chinese: 植物甾醇屬於甾體類化合物，具有多種生理功能。

sentences.english: Phytosterols were important raw material in the production of hormonal medicines.
sentences.chinese: 植物甾醇是生產甾體藥物的重要原料。

sentences.english: The anticancer effect and mechanism of phytosterols were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 概述了植物甾醇的抗癌作用和機理。

sentences.english: Various quantitative analysis methods for plant sterol are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 概述了各種植物甾醇定量分析方法。

sentences.english: Concentration of ergosterol was measured by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 利用HPLC檢測麥角甾醇的含量。

sentences.english: The present study was used to investigate the effects of phytosterol ester on blood lipids through animal trials.
sentences.chinese: 本文通過動物試驗研究植物甾醇酯的降血脂作用。

sentences.english: Many kinds of materials were used to get the crude phytosterols through different treatments.
sentences.chinese: 選用多種原料進行不同的處理得到粗製甾醇。

sentences.english: The phytosterol in apple seed has wide spectrum and normal temperature antibacterial activity.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果籽油中植物甾醇有廣譜和常溫的抑菌活性。

sentences.english: Fungus Zhuhuang contains extremely small quantity of peroxy-ergosterol.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定真菌竹黃中過氧麥角甾醇的含量。

sentences.english: However, it had no effect on sterol biosynthesis of this fungus.
sentences.chinese: 武夷菌素對灰黴菌菌絲麥角甾醇的合成影響不大。

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4
bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
